&#x5F53;&#x53D1;&#x751F;&#x8FD9;&#x79CD;&#x6743;&#x9650;&#x653E;&#x5927;&#x7684;&#x573A;&#x666F;&#x65F6;&#xFF0C;Linux&#x7684;&#x5B89;&#x5168;&#x7279;&#x6027;&#x8981;&#x6C42;&#xFF0C;&#x6B64;&#x65F6;&#x5B50;&#x8FDB;&#x7A0B;&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x67D0;&#x4E9B;&#x654F;&#x611F;&#x73AF;&#x5883;&#x53D8;&#x91CF;&#x4F1A;&#x88AB;&#x6E05;&#x7A7A;&#xFF0C;&#x4F8B;&#x5982;&#xFF1A;LD_PRELOAD,LD_LIBRARY_PATH&#x3002;&#x7531;&#x4E8E;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x73AF;&#x5883;&#x53D8;&#x91CF;&#x90FD;&#x662F;&#x4ECE;&#x7236;&#x8FDB;&#x7A0B;&#x7EE7;&#x627F;&#x8FC7;&#x6765;&#x7684;&#xFF0C;&#x5982;&#x679C;&#x4E0D;&#x6E05;&#x7A7A;&#xFF0C;&#x5219;&#x8868;&#x660E;&#x4F1A;&#x4F7F;&#x7528;&#x9AD8;&#x6743;&#x9650;&#x7EA7;&#x522B;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x8FD9;&#x4E9B;&#x73AF;&#x5883;&#x53D8;&#x91CF;&#x6307;&#x5B9A;&#x7684;&#x53EF;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#x3002;</p> <h1 style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; font-weight: 700; font-size: 41px; border-bottom: 3px double #999; color: #000; margin-top: 14px;">LD_LIBRARY_PATH</h1> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333;">&#x53C2;&#x8003;&#x6587;&#x732E;[1]&#xFF0C;ld.so&#x641C;&#x7D22;&#x52A8;&#x6001;&#x5E93;&#x7684;&#x987A;&#x5E8F;&#x5982;&#x4E0B;&#xFF1A;</p> <ol style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; display: block; padding-left: 30px; margin: 6px 0 10px; color: #333; list-style-type: decimal;"> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">DT_PATH&#x6307;&#x5B9A;&#x7684;&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#xFF08;deprecated&#xFF09;</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">LD_LIBRARY_PATH&#x6307;&#x5B9A;&#x7684;&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">DT_RUNPATH&#x6307;&#x5B9A;&#x7684;&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">/etc/ld.so.cache&#x8FD9;&#x4E2A;&#x4E8C;&#x8FDB;&#x5236;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#x6307;&#x5B9A;&#x7684;&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#xFF0C;&#x8BE5;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#x901A;&#x8FC7;ldconfig&#x547D;&#x4EE4;&#x751F;&#x6210;</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">In the default path /lib, and then /usr/lib. (On some 64-bit architectures, the default paths for 64-bit shared objects are /lib64, and then /usr/lib64.) If the binary was linked with the -z nodeflib linker option, this step is skipped.</li> </ol> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333;">&#x6240;&#x4EE5;&#x9488;&#x5BF9;LD_LIBRARY_PATH&#xFF0C;&#x9664;&#x4E86;&#x7B2C;&#x4E8C;&#x6761;&#x7684;&#x65B9;&#x6CD5;&#x5931;&#x6548;&#xFF0C;&#x5176;&#x4ED6;&#x7684;&#x90FD;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x7528;&#x3002;</p> <h1 style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; font-weight: 700; font-size: 41px; border-bottom: 3px double #999; color: #000;">LD_PRELOAD</h1> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333;">&#x90A3;&#x9488;&#x5BF9;LD_PRELOAD&#xFF0C;&#x662F;&#x4E0D;&#x662F;&#x5C31;&#x6CA1;&#x6CD5;&#x7528;&#x5462;&#xFF1F;&#x5176;&#x5B9E;&#x4E5F;&#x4E0D;&#x662F;&#x3002;<br> &#x5728;&#x6CA1;&#x6709;setcap&#x4EE5;&#x53CA;set-user-ID&#x7684;&#x60C5;&#x51B5;&#x4E0B;&#xFF0C;&#x5982;&#x679C;ld.so&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x9884;&#x52A0;&#x8F7D;&#x4E00;&#x4E2A;&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#xFF0C;&#x6307;&#x5B9A;&#x65B9;&#x6CD5;&#x5728;&#x6587;&#x732E;[1]&#x4E2D;&#x540C;&#x6837;&#x6709;&#x63CF;&#x8FF0;&#xFF1A;</p> <ol style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; display: block; padding-left: 30px; margin: 6px 0 10px; color: #333; list-style-type: decimal;"> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">The <code style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; border: 0; border-radius: 0; color: #c1788b; padding: 4px 4px 2px 0; letter-spacing: -.3px;">LD_PRELOAD</code> environment variable.</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">The <code style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; border: 0; border-radius: 0; color: #c1788b; padding: 4px 4px 2px 0; letter-spacing: -.3px;">--preload</code> command-line option when invoking the dynamic linker directly.</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;">The <code style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; border: 0; border-radius: 0; color: #c1788b; padding: 4px 4px 2px 0; letter-spacing: -.3px;">/etc/ld.so.preload</code> file.</li> </ol> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333;">&#x5728;secure-execution&#x6A21;&#x5F0F;&#x4E0B;&#xFF0C;&#x65B9;&#x6CD5;2&#x548C;&#x65B9;&#x6CD5;3&#x5747;&#x4E0D;&#x53D7;&#x5F71;&#x54CD;&#x3002;&#x65B9;&#x6CD5;1&#x4E5F;&#x4ECD;&#x7136;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x4F7F;&#x7528;&#x3002;&#x4F46;&#x662F;&#x9700;&#x8981;&#x4E00;&#x4E9B;&#x7279;&#x6B8A;&#x7684;&#x8BBE;&#x7F6E;&#xFF0C;&#x5728;[1]&#x4E2D;&#x4E5F;&#x6709;&#x63CF;&#x8FF0;&#x3002;</p> <blockquote style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 15px 0; border-left: 4px solid #ddd; padding: 0 15px; color: #777;"> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0;">In secure-execution mode, <strong style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; font-weight: 700;">preload pathnames containing slashes are ignored</strong>. Furthermore, shared objects are preloaded <strong style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; font-weight: 700;">only from the standard search directories</strong> and only if <strong style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; font-weight: 700;">they have set-user-ID mode bit enabled</strong> (which is not typical).</p> </blockquote> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333;">&#x7EFC;&#x4E0A;&#xFF0C;&#x9700;&#x8981;3&#x70B9;&#x914D;&#x7F6E;&#xFF1A;</p> <ul style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; display: block; list-style-type: disc; padding-left: 30px; margin: 6px 0 10px; color: #333;"> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; position: relative;">LD_PRELOAD&#x73AF;&#x5883;&#x53D8;&#x91CF;&#x6307;&#x5B9A;&#x7684;&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#x4E0D;&#x80FD;&#x5305;&#x542B;&#x659C;&#x7EBF;&apos;/&apos;</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; position: relative;">&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#x53EA;&#x4F1A;&#x4ECE;&#x6807;&#x51C6;&#x8DEF;&#x5F84;&#x4E0B;&#x52A0;&#x8F7D;&#x3002;&#x8FD9;&#x91CC;&#x6807;&#x51C6;&#x8DEF;&#x5F84;&#x53EF;&#x4EE5;&#x53C2;&#x8003;LD_LIBRARY_PATH&#x4E2D;&#x7684;&#x63CF;&#x8FF0;&#x3002;&#x6CE8;&#x610F;&#xFF0C;&#x6B64;&#x65F6;ld.so&#x53EA;&#x4F1A;&#x641C;&#x7D22;&#x6807;&#x51C6;&#x8DEF;&#x5F84;&#xFF0C;&#x4E0D;&#x4F1A;&#x641C;&#x7D22;&#x901A;&#x8FC7;&#x5176;&#x4ED6;&#x624B;&#x6BB5;&#x914D;&#x7F6E;&#x7684;&#x8DEF;&#x5F84;&#xFF08;&#x5982;&#x4E0A;&#x4E00;&#x8282;&#x63CF;&#x8FF0;&#x7684;&#xFF09;&#x3002;</li> <li style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; position: relative;">&#x5E93;&#x6587;&#x4EF6;&#x5FC5;&#x987B;&#x4F7F;&#x80FD;&#x4E86;set-user-id&#x4F4D;</li> </ul> <h1 style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; font-weight: 700; font-size: 41px; border-bottom: 3px double #999; color: #000;">&#x793A;&#x4F8B;&#x4EE3;&#x7801;</h1> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333;">&#x4EE3;&#x7801;&#x76EE;&#x5F55;&#x6811;&#xFF1A;</p> <pre style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; border: 0; border-radius: 0; margin: 2px 0 8px; background-color: #f5f7f8;"><code style="display: block; overflow-x: auto; background: #1e1e1e; line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; border: 0; border-radius: 0; letter-spacing: -.3px; padding: 18px; color: #f4f4f4; white-space: pre-wrap;">[ben@localhost test]$ tree . . &#x251C;&#x2500;&#x2500; lib.c &#x251C;&#x2500;&#x2500; libtest.so &#x251C;&#x2500;&#x2500; main &#x251C;&#x2500;&#x2500; main.c &#x251C;&#x2500;&#x2500; test &#x2514;&#x2500;&#x2500; test.c </code></pre> <p style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; margin: 10px 0; color: #333;">main.c&#x751F;&#x6210;main&#x53EF;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x7A0B;&#x5E8F;&#xFF0C;test.c&#x751F;&#x6210;test&#x53EF;&#x6267;&#x884C;&#x7A0B;&#x5E8F;&#xFF0C;lib.c&#x751F;&#x6210;libtest.so&#x3002;</p> <pre style="line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box; border: 0; border-radius: 0; margin: 2px 0 8px; background-color: #f5f7f8;"><code style="display: block; overflow-x: auto; background: #1e1e1e; line-height: 160%; box-sizing: content-box;
